trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Cleveland
There were no other sightings in Cleveland on or around December 26th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWent out on front deck to see the snow flurries. At first my attention was on our sesecurity lights on sides of our home to better see snow flakes. I then turned my attention to the horrizon. It is very cloudy and dark out. I then saw a bright red light size of a basketball floating downward. It must have been enormous up close. Lately I have been having a lot of interesting happeni.gs. So today I prayed about it all and was feeli.g optimistic for the first time in awhiile. Kinda blew my mind and made me upset.
Summary: Bright red light falling on SE horizon
